t: Amazon.com: Cricut Maker - Smart Cutting Machine - with 10X Cutting Force, Cuts 300+ Materials, Create 3D Art, Home Decor & More, Bluetooth Connectivity, Compatible with iOS, Android, Windows & Mac, Champagne
s: With its powerful blades, pens, and scoring tool, Cricut Maker works with hundreds of materials – from delicate paper and fabric to chipboard and balsa. Cuts through virtually any fabric quickly and accurately – without backing material. It’s also ideal for cutting crepe paper and felt. Works like an X-ACTO knife to cut heavy materials like matboard and 2.4mm balsa. Hundreds are available from top brands ...
